players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob's gone on the first night. We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of someone more suspicious like me or Bob? That seems odd."

Charlie: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you really were the detective, wouldn't it be smarter to keep that information hidden and build a case? Now the real detective knows you're lying."
Diana: "I am the detective and my investigation clearly shows Charlie is mafia. Alice, I investigated Charlie because random first checks are standard. We must vote Charlie out."
You: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself immediately? That puts a target on your back. Your claim feels rushed and desperate."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
